showcase.content:
showcase:
    title: S.S. Compucare
    slides:
        -   type: heading
            heading: S.S. Compucare
            description: A price list catalog website for a Cyprus-based small business

        -   type: subheading
            heading: Features

        -   type: feature
            heading: Price list catalog
            description: A list of price lists in PDF format, provided by the administrator
            screenshot:
                type: iphone
                file: /compucare-pricelist.PNG
                imageAltText: Mobile screenshot showing price lists

        -   type: feature
            heading: "Price list catalog: Categories"
            description: Categories are located in the main navigation, making it easier for customers to find what they're looking for
            screenshot:
                type: iphone
                file: /compucare-categories.PNG
                imageAltText: Mobile screenshot showing categories
                
        -   type: feature
            heading: Dark mode
            description: The website toggles between light and dark mode, according to the user's display settings
            screenshot:
                type: iphone
                file: /compucare-darkmode.PNG     
                imageAltText: Mobile screenshot showing dark mode

        -   type: feature
            heading: Multilingual
            description: The website is available in English and Greek
            screenshot:
                type: iphone
                file: /compucare-greek.PNG     
                imageAltText: Mobile screenshot showing the website in Greek
                
        -   type: feature
            heading: "Accessibility: High contrast version"
            description: The whole website is available in high contrast for people with eyesight problems or colour blindness
            screenshot:
                type: iphone
                file: /compucare-highcontrast.PNG
                imageAltText: Mobile screenshot showing high contrast mode

        -   type: feature
            heading: "Accessibility: Keyboard access"
            description: Everything on the website is accessible with a keyboard. Option to skip navigation and jump straight to the website content
            screenshot:
                type: chrome
                file: /compucare-keyboardaccess.png
                imageAltText: Desktop screenshot showing skip navigation prompt

        -   type: feature
            heading: "Admin console"
            description: A secure space for the administrator to upload price lists by a simple drag and drop
            screenshot:
                type: chrome
                file: /compucare-admin.png
                imageAltText: Desktop screenshot showing admin console

        -   type: details
            heading: Stack
            table:
                -   name: File storage
                    value: Google Drive API
                -   name: Data storage
                    value: Google Sheets API
                -   name: Backend
                    value: Azure Functions
                -   name: Hosting
                    value: Netlify
                -   name: Front-end
                    value: Gatsby

        -   type: visit
            url: https://www.sscompucare.com
showcase.name: S.S. Compucare
